attributes.action: Enable medical professionals access to wear FFP3 masks for Covid positive cases
attributes.additional_details:
To protect the life of all the NHS workers and indirectly all the UK population. If NHS workers can protect themselves they can still work for their patients'health. 
Make sure that all NHS staff do not run any additional risk related to their health, being at work has to be safe at all times, even when there is only a little risk to be infected all the precautions need to be taken.
Enable the use of FFP 3 mask when in contact with Covid positive patients.
attributes.background: Offer patient facing health professionals with FFP3 masks in Covid positive wards and patience- regardless of intubation status

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/568185
